title: card.sleep Response Application Programming Interface (API) Schema
description: Response containing current sleep mode configuration for Notecard WiFi v2.

mode.description: Returns `"accel"` if the Notecard is configured to wake from deep sleep on any movement detected by the onboard accelerometer.

seconds.description: The number of seconds the Notecard will wait before entering sleep mode (only included if default settings are overridden).

samples.title: Sleep Mode Status
samples.description: Example response showing current sleep configuration.
